headline.main: Text of Donald Trump's Speech to the GOP Convention

docs.snippet: Declaring America in crisis, Donald Trump pledged to cheering Republicans and still-skeptical voters Thursday night that as president he will restore the safety they fear they're losing, strictly curb immigration and save the nation from Hillary C...
docs.lead_paragraph: Declaring America in crisis, Donald Trump pledged to cheering Republicans and still-skeptical voters Thursday night that as president he will restore the safety they fear they're losing, strictly curb immigration and save the nation from Hillary Clinton's record of "death, destruction, terrorism and weakness."

headline.main: Trump Says America in Crisis _ and He'll Fix It 'Fast'
headline.print_headline: Trump Says America in Crisis _ and He'll Fix It 'Fast'

docs.snippet: Donald Trump accused Democratic rival Hillary Clinton of a legacy of "death, destruction, terrorism and weakness" as U.S. secretary of state and vowed to be tough on crime and illegal immigrants in a speech on Thursday accepting the Republican pre...
docs.lead_paragraph: Donald Trump accused Democratic rival Hillary Clinton of a legacy of "death, destruction, terrorism and weakness" as U.S. secretary of state and vowed to be tough on crime and illegal immigrants in a speech on Thursday accepting the Republican presidential nomination.

headline.main: Trump Accepts Republican Nomination, Vows to Put 'America First'
headline.print_headline: Trump Accepts Republican Nomination, Vows to Put 'America First'

docs.snippet: Despite promising "the truth, and nothing else" in his convention speech, Donald Trump presented the nation with a series of previously debunked claims and some new ones Thursday night — about the U.S. tax burden, the perils facing police, H...
docs.lead_paragraph: Despite promising "the truth, and nothing else" in his convention speech, Donald Trump presented the nation with a series of previously debunked claims and some new ones Thursday night — about the U.S. tax burden, the perils facing police, Hillary Clinton's record and more.

headline.main: AP FACT CHECK: Trump Resurfaces Debunked Claims in Speech
headline.print_headline: AP FACT CHECK: Trump Resurfaces Debunked Claims in Speech

docs.snippet: Donald Trump has said a lot of things that, were he a sitting U.S. president instead of a candidate for the job, could be expected to roil financial markets....
docs.lead_paragraph: Donald Trump has said a lot of things that, were he a sitting U.S. president instead of a candidate for the job, could be expected to roil financial markets.

headline.main: Trump Leaves Some on Wall Street Wary and Confused
headline.print_headline: Trump Leaves Some on Wall Street Wary and Confused

docs.snippet: People seeking a deeper understanding of Donald Trump's economic policy came up empty-handed this week at the Republican National Convention....
docs.lead_paragraph: People seeking a deeper understanding of Donald Trump's economic policy came up empty-handed this week at the Republican National Convention.

headline.main: To Wonks Hungry for Policy Details, Trump Team Serves Lighter Fare
headline.print_headline: To Wonks Hungry for Policy Details, Trump Team Serves Lighter Fare

docs.snippet: Members of the Democratic Party's liberal wing on Thursday nervously awaited Hillary Clinton's announcement in coming days of a vice presidential running mate, urging her to choose someone who opposes a massive Pacific free trade deal and backs to...
docs.lead_paragraph: Members of the Democratic Party's liberal wing on Thursday nervously awaited Hillary Clinton's announcement in coming days of a vice presidential running mate, urging her to choose someone who opposes a massive Pacific free trade deal and backs tough Wall Street reform.

headline.main: Clinton Faces Pressure to Pick VP Who Is Tough on Trade, Wall Street
headline.print_headline: Clinton Faces Pressure to Pick VP Who Is Tough on Trade, Wall Street

docs.snippet: U.S. Senator Ted Cruz refused to endorse Republican presidential nominee Donald Trump at the party's convention on Wednesday, drawing angry jeers from Trump supporters and shattering the facade of party unity that has been carefully built up in Cl...
docs.lead_paragraph: U.S. Senator Ted Cruz refused to endorse Republican presidential nominee Donald Trump at the party's convention on Wednesday, drawing angry jeers from Trump supporters and shattering the facade of party unity that has been carefully built up in Cleveland this week.

headline.main: Ted Cruz Jeered for Refusing to Back Trump, Exposing Republican Rift
headline.print_headline: Ted Cruz Jeered for Refusing to Back Trump, Exposing Republican Rift

docs.snippet: Ted Cruz was recounting to an audience how he had outlasted most of his 16 rivals for the Republican presidential nomination when a plane carrying the man who had won it all, Donald Trump, flew overhead, interrupting him mid-speech....
docs.lead_paragraph: Ted Cruz was recounting to an audience how he had outlasted most of his 16 rivals for the Republican presidential nomination when a plane carrying the man who had won it all, Donald Trump, flew overhead, interrupting him mid-speech.

headline.main: 'Make Republicans Whole Again!' A Divided Party Struggles to Rally Behind Trump
